Title:
Two new species of Botryosphaeria from blueberry in
China
Abstract:
Two new species of Botryosphaeria are described and
illustrated from blueberry in China. Phylogenetic analysis based on
combined ITS, LSU, tef1-Î± and TUB loci supported its separation from
another species of Botryosphaeria. Morphologically, two new species, B.
involucrata and B. pseudofabicerciana are distinguished from
phylogenetic related species, also different from other Botryosphaeria
species reported in blueberry.
